arts.ttl: The lowdown on Millwall 2 Portsmouth 1 - Ivanovic the star man as Lions secure late victory at Den
arts.sum: Millwall: Jensen, Bryan, Cooper, Tanganga (Leonard 43), Crama, Connolly (Emakhu 82), Saville (Mitchell 82), De Norre, Honeyman, Coburn (Langstaff 82), Ivanovic. Millwall took the game to their opponents in the early stages as they dominated possession and kept Portsmouth penned in their own half.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth defender's absence v Millwall explained as John Mousinho Championship hopes dealt another blow
arts.sum: John Mousinho has confirmed Zak Swanson missed Saturday’s defeat at Millwall because of injury.

arts.ttl: Millwall boss provides injury update on star defender Japhet Tanganga
arts.sum: Neil said: “I was really frustrated because I had three subs lined up to come on when they scored the goal. Millwall did not seem to be impeded by the substitution as they took hold of the game soon after the beginning of the second half through a 57th-minute Mihailo Ivanovic header.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth fans face delays following Millwall defeat as A3 closed because of 'police-led incident'
arts.sum: Pompey fans travelling back from today’s Championship game at Millwall by car face delays to their journey.

arts.ttl: ‘People will start talking about him’ - Millwall boss on Mihailo Ivanovic’s ‘unbelievable’ first season in Championship
arts.sum: Millwall boss Alex Neil was full of praise for 20-year-old striker Mihailo Ivanovic as his goals at The Den secured all three points in a 2-1 win over Portsmouth. Neil was also keen to highlight the impact of the partnership that Ivanovic struck up with fellow striker Josh Coburn on the day, starting alongside each other in a front two.

arts.ttl: Angry Portsmouth boss calls for action after accusing Millwall supporters of using discriminatory language
arts.sum: Pompey boss John Mousinho has called on football chiefs to act after accusing Millwall fans of using ‘discriminatory language’.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth’s costly defensive naivety slammed for putting them back in Championship relegation danger
arts.sum: Jordan Williams ripped into Pompey for handing Millwall the chances to send his side spiralling to defeat.

arts.ttl: 'High-octane display, Disappointingly anonymous, Brave and fearless': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Millwall
arts.sum: Pompey suffered yet more late away agony after Millwall snatched a dramatic victory.

arts.ttl: 'Sloppy. Mous not learning from his mistakes. Utterly inexcusable' - Portsmouth fans react to yet another defeat on road at Millwall
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to the Blues’ latest defeat on the road in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Mihailo Ivanovic strikes late as Millwall beat Portsmouth
